tooltips.value: Used to create Targeted Mod Boxes that will only give items from a particular mod.
Used in the Black Market to reroll the offers.
Used in the Augment Assembly Pedestal to craft Augments, can be obtained by recycling Augments.
Combine in anvil with a weapon to enchant it with Curse of Mercy, preventing it from killing mobs.
Place on Vault Altar to create a Tenos Zealot Vault.
Place on Vault Altar to create a Wendarr Zealot Vault.
Place on Vault Altar to create a Velara Zealot Vault.
Place on Vault Altar to create a Idona Zealot Vault.
Use with Vault Gear in the Artisan Station to add an unusual modifier.
Use with Vault Gear in the Artisan Station to freeze a Legendary, Greater, Corrupted, or Unusual modifier.
Use with Vault Gear in the Artisan Station to unfreeze all frozen modifiers.
Use with Vault Tool in an anvil to add Stylish, causing it to rotate through all tool types visually.
Use with Vault Tool in an anvil to add 10 capacity.
Use with Vault Tool in an anvil to add 10 capacity. (can be used a limited number of times)
Use with Vault Gear in an anvil to add a repair slot.
Use with Vault Gear in an anvil to add a suffix slot. (Legacy)
Use with Vault Gear in an anvil to add a prefix slot. (Legacy)
Combine with Vault Crystal in Anvil to set the Vault's Layout
Use in the Crystal Workbench to set the objective to 'Ballistic Bingo'
Use in the Crystal Workbench to set the objective to 'Slay the Guardians'
Use in the Crystal Workbench to set the objective to 'Unhinged Scavenger Hunt'
Use in the Crystal Workbench to set the objective to 'Slay the Brutal Bosses'
Use in the Crystal Workbench to set the objective to 'Enchanted Elixir'
Use in the Crystal Workbench to set the objective to 'Haunted Braziers'
Use in the Crystal Workbench to set the objective to 'Corrupted'
Use in the Crystal Workbench as a capstone, making the crystal unmodifiable and adding the 'Vendoor Hunter' modifier.
Use in the Crystal Workbench as a capstone, making the crystal unmodifiable and adding the 'Enchanted' modifier.
Use in the Crystal Workbench as a capstone, making the crystal unmodifiable and adding the 'Frenzy' curse.
Use in the Crystal Workbench as a capstone, making the crystal unmodifiable and adding the 'Prosperous' modifier, guaranteeing an artifact
Use in the Crystal Workbench as a capstone, making the crystal unmodifiable and adding the 'All Seeing Eye' modifier.
Requires Vault Level 100 to use, adds 1 Expertise point unless you are maxed.
Sneak and right-click on your Vault Altar to reroll the recipe.
Decorative version of the Obelisk. Right-click the base to summon lightning!
Decorative version of the Lodestone. Sneak and right-click to get a message!
Decorative version of the Brazier. Right-click to cycle through display options.
Decorative version of the Scavenger Altar.
Used to create decorative versions of the Vault Objective blocks.
Ingredient for mid-tier crafting recipes.
Ingredient for high-end crafting recipes.
Use to create a random Inscription, including some special ones.
Use to create a random valuable item.
An extremely rare item used in crafting a Wold Star.
Used in crafting Creative items.
Obtained when a vault ore would normally drop nothing.
Used to create Targeted Mod Boxes that will only give items from a particular mod.
Used in the Black Market to reroll the offers.
Used in the Augment Assembly Pedestal to craft Augments, can be obtained by recycling Augments.
Combine in anvil with a weapon to enchant it with Curse of Mercy, preventing it from killing mobs.
